posts.post_title: FS: PRICE REDUCTION - 1889 N172 Old Judge Clark Griffith (HOF Rookie)
posts.post_content:
I recently updated my "for sale" page on my imageevent website.  Many cards have already been sold, but there are still lots of goodies there, including this Old Judge, which I just added.

Asking [STRIKE]$695[/STRIKE] $595 for Griffith.

email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if you're interested in these or anything else listed.
